data.title: Production technology
data.meta_description: Shiseido continuously manufactures high-quality products using accumulated data and expertise in the manufacture of cosmetics combined with state-of-the-art technologies. Furthermore, engineers trained in traditional techniques spare no effort to execute operating procedures with accuracy and care. Here is what you may want to know about our manufacturing process, which creates reliable products of high quality.
data.text:
In cooking, two dishes made from the same recipe may taste very different if there are slight differences in the order of adding the ingredients or the strength or length of heating. This also applies to the production of cosmetics.

We continuously produce high-quality products using accumulated expertise that we have accumulated over many years with the latest technologies.

We also have many engineers trained in traditional techniques to grasp the conditions of weather and raw materials and make optimal arrangements. Carrying on these traditional techniques, the engineers spare no effort to execute the operating processes with accuracy and care in continuing to make products.
